name: human
description: all Allied Humans have a chance to Silence any enemy they attack for 4 seconds.

name: mage
description: all Enemies lose a large amount of Magic Resistance (can become negative).

name: elf
description: all Allied Elves gain bonus Evasion.

name: demon_hunter
description: special changes occur to Demons on the board.

combos.bonus: Enemy Demons lose their damage bonus
Your Demons retain their damage bonus even if they normally would not

name: demon
description: This unit deals 50% bonus Pure damage to enemies. Lose this bonus if you send out more than 1 different type of Demon.

name: assassin
description: all Allied Assassins gain a chance to deal Critical damage on hit.

combos.bonus: 15% chance to hit for 4.0x damage, as well as the previous Critical chance
20% chance to hit for 5.0x damage, as well as the previous Critical chances.

name: orc
description: all Allied Orcs gain bonus HP.

name: warrior
description: all Allied Warriors gain bonus Armor.

name: beast
description: all Allied Units deal additional attack damage.

name: druid
description: When you have N different druid units on your board, your Druids can upgrade with less of the same number of Druid.

combos.bonus: 2x ★ Druid can upgrade to a ★★ Druid
2x ★★ Druid can upgrade to a ★★★ Druid

name: goblin
description: some Allied Units receive buffs.

combos.bonus: One random Ally gains +15 Armor and +10 Health Regen
All Allied Goblins gain +15 Armor and +10 Health Regen, as well as the previous buff firing on a random Ally.

name: mech
description: all Allied Mechs gain Health Regen.

name: undead
description: all Enemies lose Armor.

name: hunter
description: all Allied Hunters deal additional attack damage.

name: warlock
description: all Allied Units gain Lifesteal.

name: ogre
description: Ogres gain +5% Max HP for each of their heads (+10%).

name: troll
description: some or all Allied Units will gain bonus Attack Speed.

combos.bonus: All Allied Trolls gain +35 Attack Speed
All Allied Units gain +30 Attack Speed.  Allied Trolls also gain the previous bonus.

name: shaman
description: a random Enemy unit will be transformed into a harmless frog as soon as the battle starts.

name: naga
description: all Allied Units gain additional Magic Resistance.

name: elemental
description: Enemy Melee units that attack certain Allies have a chance to turn into stone for 4 seconds.

combos.bonus: 60% chance when attacking Allied Elementals, 30% chance when attacking other Allies

name: dwarf
description: Dwarves have +300 Attack Range.

name: satyr
description: While there are any Satyrs in your waiting bench, your bench cannot be seen by other players.

name: dragon
description: When you send 3 different dragon units into battle, Allied Dragons start with 100 Mana.

name: knight
description: Allied Knights gain a shield for part of their time in battle.  The shield grants +75% Magic Resistance and +30 Armor for 3 seconds at a time.
